subject: RoboBox--2
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Just another Frankenbox gone wrong. It's a random number generator driving
the speakjet chip. The chip is reset by an antenna wire, it announces
"ready" when reset. So I try to start recording when I get the "ready". The
RNG is just the first half of the random sweep generator.

 F-S

Jus ano he F ankenbox gone w ong. I 's a andom numbe gene a o d i ing he speakje chip. The chip is ese by an an enna wi e, i announces " eady" when ese . So I y o s a eco ding when I ge he " eady". The RNG is jus he i s hal o he andom sweep gene a o . 

 
 F-S
